title: Variables
summary: Variables store values in memory so they can be reused later. In Python they don't need a fixed data type.
sample_question: What is a variable and why do we use it?

title: Loops
summary: Loops allow you to run a block of code repeatedly. For loops iterate over sequences, while loops run until a condition changes.
sample_question: Explain the key difference between a for loop and a while loop.
